<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_500652_numer0n.getrole</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>ロール情報の取得</description><name>getrole</name><script><![CDATA[var getrole = Class.create();
getrole.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    initialize: function() {},

    roleOk: function() {
        //         var uhrRec = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');

        //         uhrRec.addQuery('user', userID);
        //         uhrRec.addQuery('role.name', role);
        //         uhrRec.query();
        //return uhrRec.getParameter('sysparm_user_name');
        return "roleOK  " + this.getParameter('sysparm_user_name') + "!";
    },

    type: 'getrole'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-19 07:34:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>09dfd4f807e1101020b5f4be7c1ed054</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getrole</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Numer0n" source="x_500652_numer0n">750618aa2f15d01055ae309cf699b6c4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Numer0n">750618aa2f15d01055ae309cf699b6c4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_09dfd4f807e1101020b5f4be7c1ed054</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-22 01:41:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
